nodes.bodyText: These empty spaces are strange, do you know why they were inserted?
Looks like they were there in the original, but ESLint wants it to be explicit?
The dive has space before an after the cellContent so the linter to preserve those whitespace characters added the {' '} code to preserve the spacing
Interesting that no tag name is needed here.
Yes. I looked into this and the "shorthand notation" is preferred. <> is equivalent to <Fragment>.
